home.title: Moaver matches supply and demand
description: Transport companies often have spare capacity, but shippers don't know about this.
Moaver brings shippers and transporters together, matching supply and demand.
Transporters are able to reduce their empty miles and keep more of their margin.
Shippers do not have to shop around to get the best price.

blockA.title: For any load and any route
blockA.lineA: Pallets or plants, parcels or bulk? Regional only or international? Weekends, Wednesday mornings or all year round?
blockA.lineB: Moaver effectively connects the transportation needs of shippers with the available choices offered by transport companies. Moaver considers various factors such as timing, load, capacity, destination, loading options, sustainable transport, and more.

blockB.title: For every shipper and every transporter
blockB.lineA: Moaver is there for all shippers, both private individuals and organisations. This makes Moaver the only Dutch online transport platform for B2B and B2C that is not operated by a broker. The focus on user-friendliness is also unique.
blockB.lineB: Within minutes, shippers can enter their selection criteria and transporters can create a profile. Moaver does the rest.
blockB.lineC: Read more about Moaver's unique approach

b: Post a transport request in two minutes
For any freight and any route

blockD.title: Fill up your loading space with Moaver
blockD.lineA: Say goodbye to empty miles and hello to efficiency. With Moaver, you avoid empty return trips or partial loads. This is not only more efficient, but also more sustainable. You get the same turnover from transport orders with fewer or the same number of miles. And the more goods you transport, the higher your margin. Because with Moaver you pay a fixed subscription amount, not a fee per transport request.
blockD.lineB: This is how Moaver makes your transport more efficient, sustainable and economical.
blockD.button: Read more about Moaver for transport companies

blockE.title: Ship your packages with Moaver
blockE.lineA: Finding the right transporter in the online transport jungle can be difficult. How do you know if they will deliver to the right destination at the right time? If they can help you with loading or if they offer electric transport? Whether they are able to transport temperature-controlled goods or agricultural products? And do they have good reviews? Often you have to fill in a lot of personal and shipment details before a transport broker will give you the information you want.
blockE.lineB: Moaver makes it easier. You enter your search criteria in seven steps and Moaver makes the match. This saves you a lot of time and you can be sure that you are choosing the most suitable transporter at the best price. After all, the transporter will often be driving back and forth anyway. So that transporter can give you a competitive quote.
blockE.button: Read more about Moaver for shippers

seo.description: Moaver brings shippers and transport companies together. This means fewer empty miles for transporters and the best value for shippers. Read more about it here.
seo.keywords: transport, transport company, transporter, shipping packages

blockA.title: Search less
blockA.lineA: When it comes to sending a package or freight, choosing the right carrier can be a daunting task. How do you find a reliable, low-cost carrier in the vast online landscape of providers? Moaver does the search for you. You enter your search request and we find the ideal transport company. So you can quickly find the right transport at the best value for money.

blockB.title: Find more
blockB.lineA: You know where to find the transport company around the corner... but the best-known transporter is not always the best choice. How do you find the transport company with the right price, specialisation, destination and capacity at the right time? Moaver can help you. Enter your search criteria and we will give you three options. Reliable transport companies with good reviews and prices. Transporters who have spare transport capacity at that very moment, so they can offer you a competitive price.

blockC.title: How can Moaver help you?
blockC.lineA: Am I paying too much? Will this transport company handle my fragile parcels properly? Can't I send my freight earlier? As a shipper, you often only find out the answer when it is too late. When it turns out that your regular transporter is charging you a high price because he is only driving back and forth to deliver your freight. Or when your recipient complains about damaged deliveries.
blockC.lineB: With Moaver, you can be sure that you are hiring the ideal transport company – with the best value for money, experience and references. No need to do a lengthy Google search or enter all sorts of package details first. Simply enter your search query and Moaver will provide you with three suitable transport companies based on your search criteria. All three have already been screened for their accuracy, timing, location, specialisation and value for money. The final choice is yours.
blockC.lineC: Moaver brings supply and demand together. For every type of freight and every destination. Does a transport company have available space on a return trip, for example? Then the transport price is often lower. You can benefit from this. Moaver knows which transport companies have available space and when. But also when they have scheduled trips in your area.

blockD.title: Five steps in two minutes
blockD.lineA: How do you know if a transport company is right for your shipment? With other online brokers or transporters, you usually have to provide a lot of information upfront. The broker or transporter will then give you the information you want, such as times, transport options, prices and capacity. Only then do you find out if this transport company is suitable for your freight or package. Moaver makes this easier.
blockD.lineC: With Moaver you can create a transport order in two minutes. To do this, you go through seven steps. You answer questions that help Moaver find the right transporter, such as "What do you want to send?", "Is your package fragile?", "Do you want to use sustainable transport for your packages?" and "Do you need help with loading and unloading or will you do it yourself?
blockD.lineE: Have you completed the seven selection steps? Then Moaver will get to work. Within a day/a few hours, you will receive three quotes from transport companies. All of them are suitable transporters that perfectly match the selection criteria you have entered. Not only in terms of price and time, but also in terms of reliability, capacity and loading options.
blockD.lineJ: Have you compared the quotes? Then the decision is up to you. You choose the transport company you wish to use by emailing your choice to Moaver. We will then contact the transporter and send you confirmation if your transport order is approved.

blockE.title: Benefits for you as a shipper

items.title: Best value for money
items.description: Moaver selects three transport companies that match your shipment, time, destination and other transport requirements. Transporters who are already heading that way anyway, so they can offer you a competitive price.

items.title: Save time
items.description: No more lengthy Google searches to find the right transport company. Moaver takes the online search out of your hands.

items.title: The right transporter
items.description: You can be sure that the transport company will meet all your requirements. Based on your selection criteria, Moaver will select three transporters that match your shipment.

items.title: Reliable
items.description: Quality matters. That is why Moaver selects its affiliated transport companies based on reviews. This way, you can be sure that your goods are transported carefully and as agreed.

items.title: Sustainable
items.description: Want to send your parcel in a CO<sub>2</sub>-neutral way? Then choose a transport company that uses electric vehicles, a bike courier or a transporter that uses the railways.

items.title: In your own hands
items.description: You decide which transport company you want to use. Moaver will present you with three suitable quotes.

items.title: No strings attached
items.description: You do not need a subscription to send a package with Moaver. You simply pay a 3% fee on each transport order.

items.title: Customised transport
items.description: What kind of freight or package do you want to transport: a fragile package or bulk goods, for example? You specify your requirements in the search criteria. Moaver will then search for suitable transport companies.

items.title: Transparent
items.description: What you see is what you get. Moaver matches your transport request with the right transporter. There are no brokers or middlemen involved.

items.title: Fast
items.description: Transport companies are required to respond within a set timeframe, both for the quote request and the agreement. This ensures you get a fast response.

seo.description: Looking for a transport company? Moaver will find your transporter. With the right price, speciality, destination and capacity at the right time.
seo.keywords: transport, transport company, send package, ship package, freight

blockA.title: Moaver makes your transport smarter
blockA.lineA: Your transport can be more efficient, sustainable, economical and digital. With fewer empty miles and more profit margin. Wondering how to make your transport company smarter? Moaver, the online transport platform, seamlessly connects shippers' requests with your transport services.
blockA.lineC: Partial loads and empty return trips. As a transporter, you can't escape it. But you don't have to take it for granted. What if there is available freight nearby to optimise your loading space? Moaver will find a suitable load for you, minimising the number of empty miles. This is not only efficient, but also sustainable.
blockA.lineE: The circa 8% margin you get on transport is your profit. It would be a shame if you had to hand over a large part of it to middlemen such as transport brokers. You deserve better. That is why, with Moaver, instead of paying a fee per load, you pay a fixed subscription fee per month. So the more you transport, the greater the margin you keep.

blockB.title: How can Moaver help you?
blockB.lineA: Moaver matches shippers' demand with your transport services. This is automated, which means that as a transport company, you do not have to worry about it. You specify what you want. Where do you usually transport to and when? What goods do you transport? How many vehicles do you have? Moaver matches your transport capacity to the demand of shippers, both organisations and private individuals. This makes Moaver the only Dutch online transport platform for transport orders from B2B and B2C that is not operated by a broker.

items.title: Profile
items.description: When you register, you create a profile. This includes your preferences and options: do you specialise in pallet transport, temperature-controlled transport or bulk transport? Do you only operate in the north of the Netherlands or do you mainly drive to foreign destinations? Do you have spare transport capacity, for example for partial loads or empty return trips? Moaver can solve this for you.

items.title: Match
items.description: Once your profile is complete, Moaver gets to work. Commercial and private shippers see your profile. Does your offer match their needs? Then they can request a quote from you. For example, a shipper wants to transport ornamental flowers from Aalsmeer to Friesland on Monday, while you return to Heerenveen with vacant space? Then that's a match.

items.title: Quote
items.description: Is there a match? Then a shipper will request a quote. Moaver will send this request directly to you by email. You decide whether to accept it or not. Are you interested in a transport job? Fill in the fixed quotation format and Moaver will do the rest. If the shipper chooses you, you will receive confirmation and you can schedule the trip.

items.title: Save time
items.description: No more searching online for suitable transport assignments. Moaver does this for you by proactively contacting affiliated transport companies when a match is found.

items.title: Efficiency
items.description: You can easily fill empty loading space. This means fewer empty miles. In other words, more freight and more revenue per mile you drive.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: By cleverly filling cargo space, you need to travel fewer miles. This reduces your fleet's CO2 emissions. In addition, more and more shippers are choosing their transport partners based on sustainability. This is why you can indicate whether you offer electric transport in your profile.

items.title: Stay in control
items.description: As a transport company, you are in control. You decide whether or not to respond to a request and whether or not to accept a job.

items.title: Economies of scale
items.description: The more transport jobs you perform as a transport company, the greater your margin. With Moaver, you do not pay a fee per job, but a fixed subscription fee per month. This allows you to save a lot on transport costs and helps you to plan your expenses.

items.title: Digital ready
items.description: Take the step towards further digitalisation. As an online transport platform, Moaver automates your search for suitable transport orders. It also enables you to automatically enter transport data into planning systems.

items.title: Process optimisation
items.description: Your administrative systems integrate with Moaver via APIs. Addresses, times, freight information and other planning information are automatically entered into your systems. This results in streamlined processes, time saved and fewer typing errors.

items.title: Visibility
items.description: As a transport company, you are more visible to potential customers. In your profile and reviews, they can see where your expertise lies, what your organisation has to offer and what your strengths are.

items.title: The foundation for growth
items.description: Increase your customer base and turnover. Moaver provides you with new customers without you having to invest time. No long waits and awkward loads, just direct transport orders that fit perfectly with your capacity and planning.

cta.title: Looking to make your transport smarter?
cta.description: Make your transport more efficient, sustainable, economical and digital.

seo.description: How can you make your transport more efficient, sustainable and cost-effective? Moaver matches the demand of shippers with the supply of transport companies. Read more about it here.
seo.keywords: transport, transport company, transport costs, transport online, sustainable transport, freight

aboutUs.title: Moaver bridges the transport gap
aboutUs.description: Transport companies frequently incur empty miles, while shippers possess packages or freight that could occupy that vacant space. Moaver’s transport platform aims to bridge this transportation gap. How? By effectively pairing shipments with available transport capacity. As a result, transport companies can optimise their journeys, and shippers secure suitable transportation while maximising value for money.

items.title: …every transporter
items.description: For SMEs and sole traders. For international to local transport. For specialists and all-rounders.

items.title: …every shipper
items.description: For companies and private customers. For help with loading/unloading. For sustainable transport.

items.title: …any load
items.description: For a single parcel or recurring bulk loads. For agricultural produce and pallets.

items.title: …any destination
items.description: For regional and international deliveries. For logistics centres or private addresses.

items.title: …any time
items.description: For a specific time of day or throughout the month. For one-off and recurring shipments.

blockB.title: A unique transport platform born from necessity
blockB.lineA: Transporters want to fill up their freight space, but don't know how. Private customers and companies want to ship their parcels and freight at the best value for money, but don't know how. Moaver was born out of this necessity.
blockB.lineB: Coming from a family of transport professionals, founder Roy Bleeker saw the gap between transport demand and supply grow. In fact, he often encountered this gap in his daily work. His employer wanted to move products quickly, but could not find the right transporter in time. This resulted in delays and waiting customers. So Roy decided to set up Moaver: an online platform that brings supply and demand together. It quickly and easily connects shippers and transporters, without the need to invest a lot of time and money.
blockB.lineC: Current transport brokers and transporters do not make online matching any easier. Shippers have to wade through registration procedures before they can even see if a broker or transport company can meet their transport needs. For example, to see if a transporter operates to certain destinations, at certain times, and offers certain transport options such as temperature-controlled transport or passenger transport. Surely there must be a smarter way of doing this?

blockC.title: How does Moaver help transport companies?
items: Transport companies create a one-off profile on Moaver.
In this profile, they specify which transport options they have available at any given time.
Does a suitable transport request come in? Then Moaver emails it to the transporter.
The transporter is in control: they decide for each job whether they want it or not.
Is a transporter interested in a transport assignment? Then Moaver sends their profile to the shipper.
The shipper indicates whether the interest is mutual. If so, Moaver asks the transporter to submit an offer using the fixed format.
Is the offer accepted? Then the transporter can accept and schedule the job.
blockC.button: Read more about the benefits for transport companies

blockD.title: How does Moaver help shippers?
items: Companies or private customers create a transport order in Moaver. The process takes two minutes and consists of seven steps.

In these steps, they enter relevant search criteria: What do they want to send, when and where to? Do they want to send parcels carbon-neutral? Do they need help with loading/unloading? Is the shipment urgent?
Moaver selects three suitable transport companies that offer their quotes within a certain time frame and emails their quotes to the shipper.
From the three quotes, the shipper chooses the preferred transport company.
Moaver arranges the agreement with the transport company and puts the shipper and the transporter in touch with each other.
blockD.button: Read more about Moaver for shippers

blockE.title: Moaver makes matching easy
blockE.description: Moaver has a clear mission: to make it easier to match transport supply and demand, for both shippers and transporters. To do this, Moaver takes a unique approach. After a quick registration, Moaver will take the search out of your hands. This means that transporters and shippers know how to find each other, with minimal investment in time and money.

seo.description: The Moaver transport platform brings supply and demand together. Transport made easy, for shippers and transport companies. For any shipment, any route and any time of day.
seo.keywords: transport, transport company, transporter, parcel, shipment
